body.name: ICOLER UNI Fan 120 Infinity Mirror Module Daisy-Chain 5V+ARGB Fan 120mm Reverse Fan Single Pack Suitable for Computer Case & 360mm AIO Cooler
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery March 10 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Daisy-Chain Design : Slide-in / PIN-to-PIN interlocking mechanism，Unprecedented flexibility / A quicker and easier installation process Only one cable is required for each fan cluster Efficiently solve the installation mechanism line and save installation time. The interior of the chassis is cleaner and more beautiful.
Damping low noise, stable and efficient 8 pads reduce resonance and extra wear noise value ≤29dBA

The shape and Angle of the fan blades are designed based on bionics. The large fan blades generate strong wind pressure and large air volume to provide efficient heat dissipation performance. Each fan can provide up to 58.36CFM
Light effect of surround Infinity Mirror: Based on the collection form of infinity mirror, it presents a 3D visual sense under the light of the front ARGB light strip

Support 5V ARGB divine light synchronization: Support the market four major motherboard manufacturers 5V3PIN ARGB interface, realize divine light synchronization, programmable custom 16 million colors

PWM intelligent temperature control: Support motherboard 4PINPWM temperature control interface, according to the CPU temperature intelligent adjustment of fan speed, 800~2000RPM, with energy saving and noise reduction

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Daisy-Chain Design : Slide-in / PIN-to-PIN interlocking mechanism，Unprecedented flexibility / A quicker and easier installation process Only one cable is required for each fan cluster Efficiently solve the installation mechanism line and save installation time. The interior of the chassis is cleaner and more beautiful.

Support 5V ARGB divine light synchronization: Support the market four major motherboard manufacturers 5V3PIN ARGB interface, realize divine light synchronization, programmable custom 16 million colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Like The Lian Li Fans
reviews.reviewText: so Ive Purchase two 3 packs of the fans and i most say this was the best purchase ive made.reason why i purchase this was. I was looking to purchase Lian Li 3 pack Uni Daisy-Chain ARGB LCD fans but they are in pre-order so i had the singles but it was sold out. so as i was on amazon to see if amazon had the new fans that was available ive stumbled on this. Actually it was another fan that looked like this i put that item in my cart but then as i was about to order it this fan popped up. what made me not buy the other well. i wanted something that looked just like the Lian Li UNI Fan 120 Infinity Mirror Module Daisy-Chain ARGB Fans and this was a perfect copy of it. the connection is just like it and what shocked me was the fans comes with 2 sets of connectors the connectors can be used with all 3 fans which you only need to use 1 connector if you wanna use 2 fans and use the single 1 you can use the 1 connector plug that into your motherboard Jrainbow 5v port and use the other connector & plug the single fan onto the other header of the connector. BTW the connectors have 2 ARGB male & Female 3 pin headers 1 PWM header and another 3 pin connector that can be connected to a controller hub or a 3 pin ARGB led strip.Also this is a very cheaper way to get the look you want without paying a lot just for a name brand.the fast connection is what i always wanted to do with out always having to undo my cable management unplug the fans from the hub unscrew the fans 1 by 1. when all i need to do is unscrew 1 set of fans unlink them and thats it. doo to the fans not having any plugs and being used by a uni link and only using 1 cord makes maintenance and replacing easy. BTW they also have a reverse JM-V2 fans that has the Infinity Mirrors on both sides so you dont have to worry about flipping your fans around and seeing the logo not with the reverse Infinity Mirror you can enjoy using your fans in a intake or exhaust hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fans are bad they run fine but the rgb does not work. The cables are not compatible with anything new gen if you have a computer from 1998 it will work great for you. Daisy chain? Tell me why there are 2 cords that connect 3 fans and those 2 cords can’t be plugged in anywhere. The fan part works the led parts do not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to any gaming rig
reviews.reviewText: I've only ever used fans that connect individually to the fan controller and ARGB controller. This was my first experience working with interconnecting fans. I must say, I wish this was invented years ago (or maybe it was and I was an ignorant shopper). It's just plain sensible to have the fans connect in this manner. It simplifies wiring and looks a lot cleaner when done. The fans run very quiet, and the lighting effect is pleasant and unobtrusive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality computer fans
reviews.reviewText: These fans are very good quality, they did not come with an included argb controller but most motherboards these days provide a header to support them. They are bright and excellent quality. They snap together firmly and look very nice. I like them a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Just built a new PC and didnt want to pay the Lian Li Premium for their infinity fans. Fans are very bright and work very well and run pretty quiet. Fans work exactly as advertised. I was able to connect 4 fans together and use the cords on the end to connect to my fan hub. Fans appears with no issues on the RGB Fusion 2.0 software. Fans are very bright, brightness was able to be controlled through the software as well. (The review picture has them on the lowest brightness btw) I can confirm this works with new PCs. All of my parts were manufactured in 2023. Mobo is a GIGABYTE Z790 AORUS ELITE X. I just want a reverse intake version now.Update 1/30/24Swapped out the GigaByte parts for Asus ones due Gigabytes software and Bios issues. Fans work with Aura Sync and have even the same colors as the Asus ones. I was able to daisy chain another 4 fans for the top with no issues.Added 2nd photo of updated build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lighting Really just amazing
reviews.reviewText: I love infinity mirrors so much and because the lighting on them looked nice.Super super super easy installation and like I said they look amazing
